title: Immigration officer verification (internal checkpoints, enforcement)
dataVerified: Officer name, photo, badge number, agency, credential number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Person verifies immigration officer credentials at internal checkpoints (100-mile border zone - affects 2/3 of US population), ICE home visits, workplace raids, or plainclothes officer encounters. Domain binding verifies government agency (cbp.gov, ice.gov, border-agency.gov). Prevents fake immigration officer extortion scams (criminals impersonating ICE/CBP to extort money from immigrants, threaten deportation unless 'fines' paid). Critical for immigrant communities targeted by fraud. Enhances accountability for legitimate immigration enforcement.
